Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Cowboys owned at home Thanksgiving.  Ravens coming to Buffalo! Two great teams, two great young QB’s. Should be on national TV.  Go Bills!!!

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Josh Allen is getting better due to the K-Gun offense being brought back. Gives Allen the time to read the defense. Dabolll deserves credit.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: If there is a betting site where you can short the Patriots to win the SuperBowl, go all in.

Name: FundyLongShort
Text: @DumbLuckCapital That's some tall cotton right there.  We had some good ones, but nothing in that league.  The Petrus wasn't tired?
